text: The women's 50 metre butterfly competition of the swimming event at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games was held on 7 June at the OCBC Aquatic Centre in Kallang, Singapore. ==Records== Prior to this competition, the existing Asian and Games records were as follows: {| class="wikitable" |- |Asian record | |25.42 |Barcelona, Spain |3 August 2013 |- |Games record | |26.59 |Palembang, Indonesia |17 November 2011 |} The following records were established during the competition: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! Date !! Event !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !! Record |- | 7 June || Final ||align=left|Tao Li ||align=left| || 26.58 ||align=center| GR |} ==Schedule== All times are Singapore Standard Time (UTC+08:00) {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Event |- |rowspan="3"|Sunday, 7 June 2015 ||09:00 ||Heat 1 |- |09:02 ||Heat 2 |-style="background-color:lemonchiffon;" |19:00 ||Final |} ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:90%; title: Swimming at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games – Women's 50 metre butterfly
